game.name: Wizards & Summons
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Among wizards, various things come into vogue and then fade away. "Wizards & Summons" is one of them. An orthodox single-player card game with simple controls! There are over 400 types of cards available!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Among wizards, various things come into vogue and then fade away. "Wizards & Summons" is one of them. An orthodox single-player card game with simple controls! There are over 400 types of cards available!
